amendment.description: To clarify that allocated funds may be used for the Corridor One Light Rail Project.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1947 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1947 proposed by Senator Shelby for Senator Specter. (consideration: CR S13120; text: CR S13120) To clarify that allocated funds may be used for the Corridor One Light Rail Project.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1947 proposed by Senator Shelby for Senator Specter.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1947 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
